message.nexuscore.no_lux: §cNot enough Lux to use this tool!
config.nexuscore.title: Nexus Core Configuration
config.nexuscore.baseRadius.tooltip: Base radius for aggro and buffs at level 1
config.nexuscore.radiusPerLevel.tooltip: Extra radius added per level (Radius = Base + Level * PerLevel)
config.nexuscore.hpPerLevel.tooltip: Health Points added per level (MaxHP = Level * HPPerLevel)
config.nexuscore.upgradeCosts.tooltip: Format: 'modid:item_id|amount'. Index 0 = Level 1→2, Index 1 = Level 2→3, etc.
config.nexuscore.enablePlayerLights.tool: Enable dynamic lighting for players holding torches (Server-side real light)
config.nexuscore.playerLightItems.toolti: List of items that emit light when held
config.nexuscore.itemLuxCapacities.toolt: Format: 'modid:item_id|capacity'. Default capacity for tagged items if not listed here is 1000.
config.nexuscore.itemLuxCosts.tooltip: Format: 'modid:item_id|cost'. Defines Lux cost per use (block break or attack).
config.nexuscore.defaultBlockBreakCost.t: Default Lux cost for breaking blocks (if item not in itemLuxCosts list)
config.nexuscore.defaultAttackCost.toolt: Default Lux cost for attacking entities (if item not in itemLuxCosts list)
config.nexuscore.allowUseWithoutLux.tool: Allow using tools/weapons without Lux (true = works without Lux, false = requires Lux)
config.nexuscore.coreLuxGenerationPerLev: Lux generated per tick per level
